title: Large-Scale Program to Enhance Science Learning Awareness Through Peer Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience with online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: A learning environment where students share performance outcomes through peer feedback activities while conducting experiment-based science projects

learning_goals: Learners improve project quality by 20% or more by completing two or more peer feedback cycles (giving/receiving) over four weeks.
Learners write specific and actionable feedback statements with 80% or higher accuracy using a structured feedback framework (e.g., STAR technique).
Learners confirm a 15% or greater improvement in their science learning perception through surveys after feedback activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
